forum.content: After being single for 2 yrs, honestly I feel lonely, and it is true that it is much easier to be single and to do whatever I want to do without any concerns, but not to lie abt it, while you really enjoy alone, but sometime when u see your friends or ppl walking on the street with their gf or bf, it makes me feel jealous......just want someone accompany
forum.title: Tired of being single
